content: i ve heard your requests for crocheted gloves with partial fingers and i ve designed these just for you these are great for gifts and don t forget to make some any school or sports team colors this is my most sought-after pattern for holiday gifts especially for teens and young adults >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version
